See also: draussen

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • draussen (Switzerland)

Etymology[edit]

Compound of dr-, short for dar- and außen

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈdraʊ̯sən/, [ˈdʁaʊ̯sn̩]
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Adverb[edit]

draußen

  1. outside
  2. out there

Antonyms[edit]

  • drinnen

Further reading[edit]

  • draußen in Duden online
